text:
Hello,

My error_log (/usr/local/apache/logs/error_log) grew to a size of 2GB, which 
crashed apache. I will rotate it from now on, is this a know issue?
creator: tdolan@lassodatasystems.com

text:
Yes, 2.0.50 and later support >2Gb log files on Linux at least.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 13511 ***
creator: jorton@redhat.com
